snippet.title: Super Indie Karts x Freedom Planet: Dragon Valley promo, Sash Lilac reveal!
snippet.description:
A quick race in FreedomPlanet's crossover track "Dragon Valley" featured in Super Indie Karts v0.64a at 60fps in Ultrawide 21:9 ratio. Also showing the new weapon "The Pumpking", and racing with the upcoming First Person View.

Super Indie Karts gameplay recorded using beta v0.64a, available now!

Super Indie Karts is a '90s style kart racer available in Early Access on Steam (for Windows and Mac) and Razer ForgeTV featuring racetrack and kart crossovers with a heap of super Indie Games. http://store.steampowered.com/app/323670

Freedom Planet is a fast paced retro styled platformer, reminiscent of Megadrive era SEGA games, that surpasses the classics in many ways and is instantly enjoyable to anyone who loves games. You can find more info from http://freedomplanet.galaxytrail.com/
